name: Celeb Smash - Dentist fist. Help the celebrity to look like a tomato.
name_original: Celeb Smash - Dentist fist. Help the celebrity to look like a tomato.
description:
Do you like celebrities? If so don’t download this game AT ALL COST, otherwise keep reading.

Relieve your anger by showing what you think about celebs. They are bad, ignorant and offensive. You need to be a good doctor to learn them how to behave. “Enjoy" smashing multiple celebrities.

ATTENTION: *** THIS IS CRAZY GAME, YOU PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK ***
